entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 7 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 7 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
